Squared Error

Source: R/metrics-point.R
squared_error.Rd

Squared Error SE calculated as

$$ (\textrm{observed} - \textrm{predicted})^2 $$

Usage

squared_error(observed, predicted)

Arguments

observed

A vector with observed values of size n

predicted

A vector with predicted values of size n

Value

vector with the scoring values

Examples

observed <- rnorm(30, mean = 1:30)
predicted_values <- rnorm(30, mean = 1:30)
squared_error(observed, predicted_values)
#>  [1] 0.2037417492 3.4686013311 0.4872141398 0.0022318044 1.4925629923
#>  [6] 8.6606925656 0.2191271467 0.5262253374 0.0148910287 0.9081093100
#> [11] 0.0237147632 0.2938118104 0.6603068323 1.6899924017 0.7032174088
#> [16] 2.1103291725 0.0470657431 0.4883384996 0.1413828615 1.8646186659
#> [21] 1.9441129392 1.0103977542 0.1296509812 0.0004450313 0.9537864914
#> [26] 1.1728560605 1.2173957500 5.2772505588 2.9687272954 2.4251969338
